p: The spectrum of antifungal activity of the peptides and time-dependent decrease in those activity assays was evaluated in vitro by disc-diffusion assay as indicated [ 25, 48]. All thionins tested were dissolved in 50% ethanol ( v/ v) and applied on discs at a concentration of 0.5 mM (~1 nmol per disc). Inhibition zones were measured manually using digital caliper. Assays were performed three times in triplicate.
